Effect: Accept Echo.name: 效果: Accept Echo
Effect: Accept Echo.description:
While in this state, you become trained in the weapon you chose and an expert in the skill you chose. Additionally, while you're in this state, the echo can speak and interact with the Material Plane using your body, and you gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects, as the possessing spirit protects you from other possessions.

This state lasts for 10 minutes, after which the echo disappears completely until the next time you make your daily preparations. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this effect.

At 7th level you become a master of the skill you chose, at 13th level you become an expert with the weapon you chose, and at 15th level you become legendary with the skill you chose.

Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.name: 效果: Accursed Clay Fist
Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.

Effect: Aldori Parry.name: 效果: Aldori Parry
Effect: Aldori Parry.description:
需求 You are wielding only an Aldori dueling sword and have your other hand or hands free.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirement.

Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).name: 效果: 阵营武装(混乱) Align Armament (Chaotic)
Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{阵营武装 Align Armament}.

在1轮中，该武器造成额外1d6混乱伤害。

Effect: Align Armament (Evil).name: 效果: 阵营武装(邪恶) Align Armament (Evil)
Effect: Align Armament (Evil).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{阵营武装 Align Armament}.

在1轮中，该武器造成额外1d6邪恶伤害。

Effect: Align Armament (Good).name: 效果: 阵营武装(善良) Align Armament (Good)
Effect: Align Armament (Good).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{阵营武装 Align Armament}.

在1轮中，该武器造成额外1d6善良伤害。

Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).name: 效果: 阵营武装(守序) Align Armament (Lawful)
Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{阵营武装 Align Armament}.

在1轮中，该武器造成额外1d6守序伤害。

Effect: Anoint Ally.name: 效果: 膏立盟友 Anoint Ally
Effect: Anoint Ally.description: 效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bRftzbFvSF1pilIo]{膏立盟友 Anoint Ally}。

Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.name: 效果: Aquatic Endemic Herbs
Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.name: 效果: Arctic Endemic Herb
Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.name: 效果: Armor Tampered With (Critical Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.description: Your armor has been tampered with! You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{flat-footed} and take a –10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect lasts until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).name: 效果: Armor Tampered With (Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).description: Your armor has been tampered with! You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{flat-footed} and take a –10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Assisting Shot.name: 效果: Assisting Shot
Effect: Assisting Shot.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).name: 效果: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit)
Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you critically hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Augment Senses.name: 效果: Augment Senses
Effect: Augment Senses.description: Until the start of your next turn, you can't be flanked.

Effect: Aura of Despair.name: 效果: Aura of Despair
Effect: Aura of Despair.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wjnfdh6WzN7HbmeE]{Aura Of Despair}

Enemies within 15 of you take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Aura of Faith.name: 效果: Aura of Faith
Effect: Aura of Faith.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7sFhBYoz5GSBFNbY]{Aura of Faith}

Each good-aligned ally within 15 feet deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.

Effect: Aura of Life.name: 效果: Aura of Life
Effect: Aura of Life.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{Aura of Life}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.

Effect: Aura of Preservation.name: 效果: Aura of Preservation
Effect: Aura of Preservation.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura Of Preservation}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

Effect: Aura of Righteousness.name: 效果: Aura of Righteousness
Effect: Aura of Righteousness.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.erCOcFZJPT2O3gwC]{Aura of Righteousness}

You and all allies within 15 feet gain evil resistance 5.

Effect: Avenge in Glory.name: 效果: Avenge in Glory
Effect: Avenge in Glory.description:
Frequency once per day

Access mountain dwarf ethnicity

Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You honor your ally's life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoints based on level
  • Sets a circumstance bonus of +1 to attack and damage rolls

Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.name: 效果: Battle Medicine Immunity
Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} on you, rendering you immune to the effect from that person for the duration.

Effect: Bespell Weapon.name: 效果: Bespell Weapon
Effect: Bespell Weapon.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a conjuration or transmution spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).name: 效果: Bespell Weapon (Force)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast an abjuration spell or an evocation spell that didn't deal damage.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 force damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).name: 效果: Bespell Weapon (Mental)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a divination, enchantment or illusion spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 mental damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).name: 效果: Bespell Weapon (Negative)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a necromancy spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 negative damage.

Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune.description:
An anarchic rune is jagged and asymmetrical, channeling chaotic energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage against lawful targets. If you are lawful, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at a Strike with this weapon against a lawful creature, roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, you deal double minimum damage; on a 3 or 4, double your damage normally; on a 5 or 6, you deal double maximum damage.

Craft Requirements You are chaotic.

Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune.description:
Complex and symmetrical, an axiomatic rune imbues a weapon with lawful energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage against chaotic targets. If you are chaotic, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at an attack roll with this weapon against a chaotic creature, instead of rolling, count each weapon damage die as average damage rounded up (3 for d4, 4 for d6, 5 for d8, 6 for d10, 7 for d12).

Craft Requirements You are lawful.

Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune.description: A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {1d6}[positive]]]{1d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Grea.name: 效果: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Greater)
Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Grea.description:
A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {2d6}[positive]]]{2d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead creature must attempt a DC 34 Fortitude save with the following effects. This is an incapacitation effect.

Critical Success It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Success It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn.

Failure It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure It's destroyed.

Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune.description: When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}

Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Flaming Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune.description: This weapon is empowered by flickering flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} on a successful Strike, plus [[/r {1d10}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune.description: The weapon can harm creatures without physical form. A ghost touch weapon is particularly effective against incorporeal creatures, which almost always have a specific vulnerability to ghost touch weapons. Incorporeal creatures can touch, hold, and wield ghost touch weapons (unlike most physical objects).

Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Holy Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune.description:
Holy weapons command powerful celestial energy. A weapon with this rune deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[good]]]{1d6 good damage} against evil targets. If you are evil, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against an evil creature with the weapon

Effect You regain HP equal to double the evil creature's level. This is a good, positive, healing effect.

Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Keen Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune.description: The edges of a keen weapon are preternaturally sharp. Attacks with this weapon are a critical hit on a 19 on the die as long as that result is a success. This property has no effect on a 19 if the result would be a failure.

Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune.name: 效果: Blade Ally Unholy Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune.description:
An unholy rune instills fiendish power into the etched weapon. A weapon with this rune deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[evil]]]{1d6 evil damage} when it hits a good target. If you are good, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against a good creature with the weapon

Effect The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d8.success] per weapon damage die of the etched weapon.

Effect: Blizzard Evasion.name: 效果: Blizzard Evasion
Effect: Blizzard Evasion.description: You gain resistance 10 to physical damage and weakness 10 to force damage. You gain a fly speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.name: 效果: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical Failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a critical failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -4 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).name: 效果: Bolera's Interrogation (failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Bon Mot.name: 效果: Bon Mot
Effect: Bon Mot.description:
You are distracted and takes a -2 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).name: 效果: Bon Mot (Critical Success)
Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).description:
You are distracted and takes a -3 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Effect: Bone Swarm.name: 效果: Bone Swarm
Effect: Bone Swarm.description:
You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal [[/r {10d6}[bludgeoning]]]{10d6 bludgeoning damage} to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.

Effect: Brightness Seeker.name: 效果: Brightness Seeker
Effect: Brightness Seeker.description:
Trigger You attempt an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw while performing the course of action from your @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, but you haven't rolled yet.

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was woe and you proceeded anyway.

Effect: Bristle.name: 效果: Bristle
Effect: Bristle.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Cat Nap.name: 效果: Cat Nap
Effect: Cat Nap.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

Effect: Catfolk Dance.name: 效果: Catfolk Dance
Effect: Catfolk Dance.description: The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves

Effect: Cavalier's Banner.name: 效果: Cavalier's Banner
Effect: Cavalier's Banner.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Ceremony of Protection.name: 效果: Ceremony of Protection
Effect: Ceremony of Protection.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Clue In.name: 效果: 提供线索 Clue In
Effect: Clue In.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{提供线索 Clue In}。

当你尝试用一次察觉或技能检定来调查指定的客体时，你会在该检定上获得+1的环境加值。

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).name: 效果: 提供线索(侦探预备) Clue In (Detective's Readiness)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).description:
如果调查员拥有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness}专长，获得来自@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{提供线索 Clue In}的效果。

你在对抗追查客体的豁免上获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.name: 效果: 提供线索(侦探预备，专家) Clue In (Detective's Readiness, Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{提供线索 Clue In}。如果调查员拥有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{侦探预备 Detective's Readiness}专长和@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{调查员专家训练 Investigator Expertise}职业特性，获得此效果。

你在对抗追查客体的豁免上获得+2的环境加值。

Effect: Clue In (Expertise).name: 效果: 提供线索(专家) Clue In (Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Expertise).description:
如果调查员拥有@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{调查员专家训练 Investigator Expertise}职业特性，获得来自@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{提供线索 Clue In}的效果。

当你尝试用一次察觉或技能检定来调查指定的客体时，你会在该检定上获得+2的环境加值。

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: 效果: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Control Tower.name: 效果: Control Tower
Effect: Control Tower.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.name: 效果: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.name: 效果: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower Level)
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Current Spell (Air).name: 效果: 流动超魔(空气) Current Spell (Air)
Effect: Current Spell (Air).description:
如果你施展一个带有空气特征的法术，获得来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{流动超魔 Current Spell}的效果。

你的AC获得+1环境加值，如果是对抗远程攻击，那就+2。你在对抗具有空气特征的效果时，在所有豁免上获得+1环境加值。

此效果具有空气特征。

Effect: Current Spell (Water).name: 效果: 流动超魔(水) Current Spell (Water)
Effect: Current Spell (Water).description:
如果你施展一个带有水特征的法术，获得来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{流动超魔 Current Spell}的效果。

你的AC获得+1环境加值，如果是对抗远程攻击，那就+2。你在对抗具有水特征的效果时，在所有豁免上获得+1环境加值。

此效果具有水特征。

Effect: Cut from the Air.name: 效果: 空中截击 Cut from the Air
Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0]{空中截击 Cut From The Air}。

你在对抗触发条件的攻击上AC获得+4环境加值。

Effect: Daydream Trance.name: 效果: Daydream Trance
Effect: Daydream Trance.description: You take a -1 penalty to Perception checks and initiative rolls and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects. If you're legendary in Occultism, the bonus against mental effects increases to +3 .

Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.name: 效果: 致命涂毒武器 Deadly Poison Weapon
Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.description: 当你用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{致命涂毒武器 Deadly Poison Weapon}为武器涂毒后获得此效果。

Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).name: 效果: Decry Thief (Critical Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -10 foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Decry Thief (Success).name: 效果: Decry Thief (Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Success).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -5 foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).name: 效果: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).description: The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).name: 效果: Deep Freeze (Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).description: The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).name: 效果: Deep Freeze (Success)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).description: The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Defensive Instincts.name: 效果: Defensive Instincts
Effect: Defensive Instincts.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]{Defensive Instincts}

需求 you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.

Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: 效果: 防御恢复 Defensive Recovery
Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{防御恢复 Defensive Recovery}。

如果你的下个动作是以一个目标释放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}或者@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}以令其回复生命值，目标也会在AC和豁免骰上获得+2状态加值，持续1轮。

Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.name: 效果: Desert Endemic Herbs
Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Didactic Strike.name: 效果: 广泛打击 Didactic Strike
Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{广泛打击 Didactic Strike}。

在调查员的下一回合前，你对指定敌人的首次攻击如果击中，会对目标额外造成2d6点精准伤害。

Effect: Discordant Voice.name: 效果: Discordant Voice
Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

Effect: Distracting Feint.name: 效果: 分神虚招 Distracting Feint
Effect: Distracting Feint.description: 当一个生物被你虚招而陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}时，你可以让他在察觉检定和反射豁免上获得-2环境减值。

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: 效果: Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xoIxiRtBVHV27Rvd]{Divine Aegis}

Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).name: 效果: 神圣武器(混乱) Divine Weapon (Chaotic)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{神圣武器 Divine Weapon}。

直到你的回合结束，该武器额外造成1d6混乱伤害。

Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).name: 效果: 神圣武器(邪恶) Divine Weapon (Evil)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{神圣武器 Divine Weapon}。

直到你的回合结束，该武器额外造成1d6邪恶伤害。

Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).name: 效果: 神圣武器(力场) Divine Weapon (Force)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{神圣武器 Divine Weapon}。

直到你的回合结束，该武器额外造成1d4力场伤害。

Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).name: 效果: 神圣武器(善良) Divine Weapon (Good)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{神圣武器 Divine Weapon}。

直到你的回合结束，该武器额外造成1d6善良伤害。

Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).name: 效果: 神圣武器(守序) Divine Weapon (Lawful)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{神圣武器 Divine Weapon}。

直到你的回合结束，该武器额外造成1d6守序伤害。

Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.name: 效果: Dread Marshal Stance
Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Dueling Parry.name: 效果: 决斗招架 Dueling Parry
Effect: Dueling Parry.description: 效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WcY7H7mRiK2VDquV]{决斗招架(浪客) Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{决斗招架(战士) Dueling Parry (Fighter)}。

Effect: Educate Allies (Self).name: 效果: Educate Allies (Self)
Effect: Educate Allies (Self).description: Granted by using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies} on your allies.

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).name: 效果: 刻印驱魔(武器) Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{刻印驱魔 Emblazon Antimagic}.

当武器的持用者使用武器重击时，他可以尝试反制目标身上的一个法术，使用他的等级的一半，向上取整，作为反制等级。如果他如此做，刻印的徽记会立即消失。

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).name: 效果: 刻印武装(武器) Emblazon Armament (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).description:
当@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{刻印武装 Emblazon Armament}刻印在武器时获得此效果。

  • 武器 持用者在伤害骰上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).name: 效果: 刻印能量(武器,酸液) Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).description:
当你对一把武器使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{刻印能量 Emblazon Energy}时获得此效果。

  • 武器 该武器额外造成1d4酸液伤害，如果你具有酸液伤害类型的领域，该额外伤害增加到1d6。

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).name: 效果: 刻印能量(武器,寒冷) Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).description:
当你对一把武器使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{刻印能量 Emblazon Energy}时获得此效果。

  • 武器 该武器额外造成1d4寒冷伤害，如果你具有寒冷伤害类型的领域，该额外伤害增加到1d6。

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.name: 效果: 刻印能量(武器,电击) Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.description:
当你对一把武器使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{刻印能量 Emblazon Energy}时获得此效果。

  • 武器 该武器额外造成1d4电击伤害，如果你具有电击伤害类型的领域，该额外伤害增加到1d6。

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).name: 效果: 刻印能量(武器,火焰) Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).description:
当你对一把武器使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{刻印能量 Emblazon Energy}时获得此效果。

  • 武器 该武器额外造成1d4火焰伤害，如果你具有火焰伤害类型的领域，该额外伤害增加到1d6。

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).name: 效果: 刻印能量(武器,音波) Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).description:
当你对一把武器使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{刻印能量 Emblazon Energy}时获得此效果。

  • 武器 该武器额外造成1d4音波伤害，如果你具有音波伤害类型的领域，该额外伤害增加到1d6。

Effect: Emotional Surge.name: 效果: Emotional Surge
Effect: Emotional Surge.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Effect: Energize Wings.name: 效果: Energize Wings
Effect: Energize Wings.description: You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: 效果: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YZ138OqflDhrkqmR]{Enforce Oath}.

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a -1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or if the chosen creature goes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: 效果: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description: Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: 效果: 觉悟之相 Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{觉悟之相 Enlightened Presence}。

你和15尺内的盟友在对抗心灵效果的意志豁免上获得+2状态加值。

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: 效果: Eye of the Arclords
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Eye of the Arclords}.

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.

Effect: Favorable Winds.name: 效果: Favorable Winds
Effect: Favorable Winds.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX]{Favorable Winds}.

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: 效果: Fiendish Wings
Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Fleet Tempo.name: 效果: Fleet Tempo
Effect: Fleet Tempo.description: You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.name: 效果: Forest Endemic Herbs
Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.

Effect: Formation Training.name: 效果: Formation Training
Effect: Formation Training.description:
Granted by Formation Training

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

Effect: Fortify Shield.name: 效果: Fortify Shield
Effect: Fortify Shield.description: Add your level to your shield's Hardness.

Effect: Giant's Stature.name: 效果: 巨人雄姿 Giant's Stature

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: 效果: 护卫格挡 Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{护卫格挡（战士） Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{护卫格挡 (浪客) Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}。

你在对抗触发此专长的攻击时在AC上得到+2环境加值。

Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: 效果: Guided by the Stars
Effect: Guided by the Stars.description: You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: 效果: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: 效果: Heaven's Thunder
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

With a loud shout, you unleash your ki in a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs your body. Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and weapons you wield that have the monk trait deal additional electricity damage equal to one-half your level and additional sonic damage equal to one-half your level.

If you also know the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oo7YcRC2gcez81PV]{Ki Blast} ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead). Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you also takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved.

Effect: Heroes' Call.name: 效果: Heroes' Call
Effect: Heroes' Call.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: 效果: 英勇恢复 Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{英勇恢复 Heroic Recovery}。

如果你的下个动作是以一个活物为目标施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}来回复其生命值，目标也会获得以下好处，直到其下个回合的结束：在速度上+5尺状态加值，在攻击骰上+1状态加值，在伤害骰上+1状态加值。

Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: 效果: Hungry Goblin
Effect: Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: 效果: 猎手优势（连击） Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
当游侠与你分享其@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{连击 Flurry}优势时获得此效果。

你对于猎杀目标的回合内第二次攻击的多重攻击减值变为-3（使用灵巧武器为-2）而非-5，你同轮的第三次攻击的多重攻击减值变为-6（使用灵巧武器为-4）而非-10。

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: 效果: 猎手优势（机智） Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
当游侠与你分享其@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{机智 Outwit}优势时获得此效果。

你在唬骗、威慑、隐匿和任何回想关于猎物知识的检定上获得+2环境加值，对抗猎物攻击的AC上获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: 效果: 猎手优势（精准） Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
当游侠与你分享其@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{精准 Precision}优势时获得此效果。

训练让你可以攻击目标的薄弱部位。你每轮第一次命中你的猎杀目标时，还会造成1d8点额外精准伤害。（精准伤害会增加你原本造成的伤害，使用相同的伤害类型，但是对没有致命器官或者薄弱点的目标无效）。

在11级时，这一额外伤害提升到2d8点精准伤害，19级时，这一额外伤害提升到3d8点精准伤害。

Effect: Hybrid Form.name: 效果: Hybrid Form
Effect: Hybrid Form.description: In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: 效果: 精通涂毒武器 Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: 当你用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{精通涂毒武器 Improved Poison Weapon}为武器涂毒后获得此效果。

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: 效果: 战略分享 Inspired Stratagem
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description: 你重骰触发检定，并在双骰中取高。

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: 效果: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: 效果: Inspiring Resilience
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

Effect: Known Weakness.name: 效果: 洞悉弱点 Known Weakness
Effect: Known Weakness.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{洞悉弱点 Known Weaknesses}。

只要你的盟友在你的下一回合开始前发动攻击，他们在对目标的下一次攻击检定中就会获得+1环境加值。Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: 效果: 传奇怪物猎手 Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{传奇怪物猎手 Legendary Monster Hunter}专长，则获得此来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{怪物猎手 Monster Hunter}的效果。

你在下一次对抗该猎物的攻击骰上获得+2环境加值。

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: 效果: 传奇怪物守望者 Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{传奇怪物猎手 Legendary Monster Hunter}专长，则获得此来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{怪物守望者 Monster Warden}的效果。

你在下一次对抗该猎物的攻击骰上获得+2环境加值。

你在下一次对抗该特定生物的豁免检定上获得+2环境加值，在对抗该生物下一次攻击的 AC上获得+2环境加值。

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: 效果: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]{Esoteric Oath (Liberator)}.

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: 效果: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]{Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: 效果: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uv235v6hXCITAFej]{Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: 效果: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]{Shining Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: 效果: Life-Giving Magic
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: 效果: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: 效果: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: 效果: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: 效果: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: 效果: Marshal's Aura
Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: 效果: 大师猎手优势(连击) Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
当游侠与你分享其@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{大师猎手(连击) Masterful Hunter (Flurry)}优势时获得此效果。

你同一轮对猎杀目标的多次攻击减值变为，第二次攻击-2（使用灵巧武器-1），第三次和后续攻击-4（使用灵巧武器-2）。

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: 效果: 大师猎手优势(机智) Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
当游侠与你分享其@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{大师猎手(机智) Masterful Hunter (Outwit)}优势时获得此效果。

你对于多种技能的擅长让你能够轻易击败猎物。如果你在欺骗、威吓、隐秘或者你用来回忆关于猎物知识的技能上拥有大师熟练，你使用该技能对抗猎物的环境加值从+2提升到+4。

如果你对你的护甲拥有大师熟练，你对抗猎物的AC环境加值从+1提升到+2。

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: 效果: 大师猎手优势(精准) Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
当游侠与你分享其@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{大师猎手(精准) Masterful Hunter (Precision)}优势时获得此效果。

你在一轮中第二次击中猎杀目标的时候也会造成1d8精准伤害。

19级时第二次击中目标会造成2d8精准伤害，第三次击中目标会造成1d8精准伤害。

Effect: Methodical Debilitations.name: 效果: 战术衰弱 Methodical Debilitations
Effect: Methodical Debilitations.description: 目标无法夹击其他生物，也无法为盟友提供夹击。

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: 效果: 怪物猎手 Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
效果来自by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{怪物猎手 Monster Hunter}。

你在下一次对抗该猎物的攻击骰上获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Monster Warden.name: 效果: 怪物守望者 Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{怪物守望者 Monster Warden}。

你在下一次对抗该猎物的攻击骰上获得+1环境加值。

你在下一次对抗该特定生物的豁免检定上获得+1环境加值，在对抗该生物下一次攻击的 AC上获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: 效果: Mountain Endemic Herbs
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: 效果: 山岳壁垒 Mountain Stronghold
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: 你专注于和大地的连接，呼唤山岳之力阻挡敌人进攻。直到你的下一回合开始前，你的AC获得+2环境加值。

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: 效果: Mutate Weapon
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

Effect: Necrotic Infusion.name: 效果: 死灵注能 Necrotic Infusion
Effect: Necrotic Infusion.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6erzXaxxvcXYnL9H]{死灵注能 Necrotic Infusion}.

如果下个你使用的动作是施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}为单个不死生物回复生命值，目标直到其下个回合的结束前，近战武器造成额外1d6负能量伤害。如果伤害术 Harm伤害术达到5环，该伤害增加到2d6，如果伤害术 Harm达到8环，该伤害增加到3d6。

Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success).name: 效果: Overdrive (Critical Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success).description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive (Success).name: 效果: Overdrive (Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Success).description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: 效果: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: 效果: Plains Endemic Herbs
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: 效果: 涂毒武器 Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: 当你用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{涂毒武器 Poison Weapon}为武器涂毒后获得此效果。

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: 效果: Prayer-Touched Weapon
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description: The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 positive damage.

Effect: Predictable!.name: 效果: 火眼金睛 Predictable!
Effect: Predictable!.description: 当你在@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{火眼金睛 Predictable!}上成功时，获得此效果。

Effect: Predictable! (Critical Failure).name: 效果: 火眼金睛(大失败) Predictable! (Critical Failure)
Effect: Predictable! (Critical Failure).description: 若你在@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{火眼金睛 Predictable!}上大失败，获得此效果。

Effect: Predictable! (Critical Success).name: 效果: 火眼金睛(大成功) Predictable! (Critical Success)
Effect: Predictable! (Critical Success).description: 若你在@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{火眼金睛 Predictable!}上大成功，获得此效果。

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: 效果: 立身中正 Prevailing Position
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{立身中正 Prevailing Position}。

你离开所处的架式，在对抗触发条件的攻击或伤害效果的AC或豁免检定获得+4环境加值。

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: 效果: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: 效果: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: 效果: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: 效果: Protective Spirit Mask
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Granted By:@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: 效果: Psychic Rapport
Effect: Psychic Rapport.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}

Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: 效果: Purifying Breeze
Effect: Purifying Breeze.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: 效果: Push Back the Dead!
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead.

Effect: Radiant Infusion.name: 效果: 活力注能 Radiant Infusion
Effect: Radiant Infusion.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{活力注能 Radiant Infusion}.

如果你的下个动作是施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}以恢复单个活物的生命值，直到其下个回合结束，目标的近战武器和无武装攻击额外造成1d6正能量伤害。如果治疗术 Heal至少有5环级，该伤害增加到2d6，如果该法术至少8环级则增加到3d6。

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: 效果: Rampaging Form
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6 fire} damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: 效果: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold} damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: 效果: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: 效果: Reanimator Dedication
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description: The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of animate dead.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: 效果: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

Effect: Reflective Ripple Stance.name: 效果: 波纹架势 Reflective Ripple Stance
Effect: Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
你可以进行流波攻击，造成1d6钝击伤害。它属于搏击武器组，具备灵巧、缴械、非致命、摔绊、无武装和水特征。

当你处于波纹架势时，你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}、@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{游泳 Swim}和@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}的运动检定上获得+1环境加值，你在避免被卸武和摔绊的反射DC上获得+2环境加值。

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: 效果: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: 效果: 勇者无惧Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{勇者无惧 Resounding Bravery}。

当你在意志豁免上对抗敌人的能力大成功时，你在豁免上获得+1状态加值，并且获得你等级一半的临时生命值，持续一分钟。

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: 效果: 勇者无惧Resounding Bravery (对抗恐惧)
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{勇者无惧 Resounding Bravery}。

如果你在对抗恐惧效果的意志豁免上大成功，你在豁免上获得+2状态加值，并且获得相当于你等级的临时生命值，持续一分钟。

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: 效果: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: 效果: Safeguard Soul
Effect: Safeguard Soul.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: 效果: Saoc Astrology
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description:
This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Note: The effect lasts until the end of your turn, and should be manually removed after you have made a skill check.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: 效果: 斥候警告 Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{斥候警告 Scout's Warning}.

你在先攻检定上获得+1环境加值。

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: 效果: 共享回避 Shared Avoidance
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{共享回避 Shared Avoidance}.

在你15尺内的盟友若也需要对相同的危害投掷相同的豁免骰，则他们在豁免骰上也会获得+2环境加值。

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: 效果: 共享澄澈 Shared Clarity
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{共享澄澈 Shared Clarity}。

若在你15尺内的盟友针对对相同的心灵效果的相同豁免骰失败，他们也能花费其反应动作来重骰该失败的豁免骰，并获得+2环境加值。

Effect: Shed Tail.name: 效果: Shed Tail
Effect: Shed Tail.description: You take a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: 效果: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Smite Evil.name: 效果: Smite Evil
Effect: Smite Evil.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite Evil}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes with the weapon your blade ally inhabits against that foe deal an extra 4 good damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the foe attacks one of your allies, the duration extends to the end of that foe's next turn. If the foe continues to attack your allies each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Smite Good.name: 效果: Smite Good
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.T5xFirAE8VLL5Lbu]{Smite Good}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 evil damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: 效果: Sniping Duo Dedication
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.

Effect: Spin Tale.name: 效果: Spin Tale
Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: 效果: Spiral Sworn
Effect: Spiral Sworn.description: For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the level of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: 效果: Tiller's Drive
Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Effect: Titan's Stature.name: 效果: 泰坦雄姿 Titan's Stature

Effect: Topple Giants.name: 效果: Topple Giants
Effect: Topple Giants.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

Effect: Twin Parry.name: 效果: Twin Parry
Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: 效果: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.name: 效果: Underground Endemic Herbs
Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Undying Conviction.name: 效果: Undying Conviction
Effect: Undying Conviction.description: Undead creatures gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist positive damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.

Effect: Victorious Vigor.name: 效果: Victorious Vigor
Effect: Victorious Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Vivacious Bravado.name: 效果: 一身是胆 Vivacious Bravado
Effect: Vivacious Bravado.description: 使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2MHzEh1KUQEbhjUf]{一身是胆 Vivacious Bravado}时获得此效果。

Effect: Watchful Gaze.name: 效果: Watchful Gaze
Effect: Watchful Gaze.description: You gain @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.name: 效果: Weapon Tampered With (Critical Success)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.description: Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect lasts until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).name: 效果: Weapon Tampered With (Success)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).description: Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Wings of Air.name: 效果: Wings of Air
Effect: Wings of Air.description: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Witch's Charge.name: 效果: 女巫监护 Witch's Charge
Effect: Witch's Charge.description: 通过@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{女巫监护 Witch's Charge}与另一个生物构筑联系时获得此效果。

Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).name: 效果: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.name: 效果: 龙佑血脉奥秘(状态加值-自身) Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Bonus - Self)
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.description: 你的声音传递巨龙之威。你在1个回合内获得威吓检定上的+1状态加值。

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.name: 效果: 龙佑血脉奥秘(状态减值-目标) Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.description: 你的声音传递巨龙之威。目标在1个回合内意志豁免受到-1状态减值。

Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed).name: 偏好地形(获得攀爬速度) Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed)
Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed).description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{荒野漫步 Wild Stride}职业特性，当你身处森林，山地和地底中且没有攀爬速度时，获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{偏好地形（森林，山地和地底） Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)}的效果。

你获得等同于移动速度的攀爬速度。

Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed).name: 偏好地形(获得游泳速度) Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed)
Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed).description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{荒野漫步 Wild Stride}职业特性，当你身处水域中且没有游泳速度时，获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{偏好地形（水域） Favored Terrain (Aquatic)}的效果。

你获得等同于速度的游泳速度。

Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed).name: 偏好地形(增加攀爬速度) Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed)
Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed).description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{荒野漫步 Wild Stride}职业特性，当你身处森林，山地和地底中且已经拥有攀爬速度时，获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{偏好地形（森林，山地和地底） Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)}的效果。

你的攀爬速度获得+10尺状态加值。

Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed).name: 偏好地形(增加游泳速度) Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed)
Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed).description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{荒野漫步 Wild Stride}职业特性，当你身处水域中且已经拥有游泳速度时，获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{偏好地形（水域） Favored Terrain (Aquatic)}的效果。

你的游泳速度获得+10尺状态加值。

Goblin Song (Critical Success).name: Goblin Song (Critical Success)
Goblin Song (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}.

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Goblin Song (Success).name: Goblin Song (Success)
Goblin Song (Success).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}.

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.name: 架势: Clinging Shadows Stance
Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1d4 negative damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and to the DC for creatures to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.

Stance: Cobra Stance.name: 架势: 蛇拳式 Cobra Stance
Stance: Cobra Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{蛇拳式 Cobra Stance}。

你摆出一个紧绷的架式，盘旋缠绕像是一条眼镜蛇，而你平稳的手就是毒牙。在此架式时，你唯一能进行的打击就是蛇牙非武装攻击。这造成1d4点毒素伤害；属于搏击武器组；拥有灵巧、致命d10、娴熟、非致命、毒素和无武装特征。

在此架势时，你在强韧豁免与强韧DC上获得+1环境加值，你还获得等级一半的毒素抗力。

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: 架势: 蛇拳式(毒蛇出洞) Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{毒蛇出洞 Cobra Envenom}专长，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{蛇拳式 Cobra Stance}在强韧豁免还有强韧DC上赋予的环境加值从+1变成+2。

你摆出一个紧绷的架式，盘旋缠绕像是一条眼镜蛇，而你平稳的手就是毒牙。在此架式时，你唯一能进行的打击就是蛇牙非武装攻击。这造成1d4点毒素伤害；属于搏击武器组；拥有灵巧、致命d10、娴熟、非致命、毒素和无武装特征。

在此架势时，你在强韧豁免与强韧DC上获得+2环境加值，你还获得等级一半的毒素抗力。

Stance: Crane Stance.name: 架势: 白鹤架势 Crane Stance
Stance: Crane Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{白鹤架势 Crane Stance}

你进入白鹤架势，双臂宛如鹤翼舒张，如流水一般展开防御。你的AC获得+1环境加值，但唯一能进行的打击是鹤翼攻击。它造成1d6点钝击伤害，属于搏击武器组；拥有灵巧、娴熟、非致命和无武装特征。

处于白鹤架势中时，减少@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump}和@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}的DC5点，当你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}时，可额外水平移动5尺或垂直移动2尺。

Stance: Disarming Stance.name: 架势: 缴械姿态 Disarming Stance
Stance: Disarming Stance.description:
该效果来自 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{缴械姿态 Disarming Stance}.

你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{缴械 Disarm}的运动检定上得到+1环境加值。

Stance: Dragon Stance.name: 架势: 狂龙架势 Dragon Stance
Stance: Dragon Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8sy3sHwOHS4ImwvJ]{狂龙架势 Dragon Stance}。

你进入狂龙架势，强力的鞭腿攻击犹如狂龙摆尾。你可以进行龙尾攻击，造成1d10点钝击伤害。它属于搏击武器组并且有回摆、非致命、无武装特征。

处于狂龙架势中时，你可以忽略行走动作遇到的第一格困难地形。

Stance: Dueling Dance.name: 架势: 决斗之舞Dueling Dance
Stance: Dueling Dance.description: 效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9VGmE7X4aK2W8YWj]{决斗之舞（浪客） Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)}或@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FYz5eQeTox9IDkSd]{决斗之舞（战士） Dueling Dance (Fighter)}。

Stance: Everstand Stance.name: 架势: Everstand Stance
Stance: Everstand Stance.description: When in this stance, you wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction.

Stance: Gorilla Stance.name: 架势: 金刚式 Gorilla Stance
Stance: Gorilla Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{金刚式 Gorilla Stance}。

你俯下身子，采取一个用指关节行动，令人难忘的架式。你进入金刚式，你唯一能进行的打击就是猩猩非武装攻击的挥击。这能造成1d8点钝击伤害；属于搏击武器组；拥有回摆、叠劲、擒抱、非致命与非武装特征。

当你处于金刚式时，你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}的运动检定上获得+2环境加值，如果你在攀爬的运动检定上骰出成功，你算做大成功。

Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).name: 架势: 金刚式(金刚重捶) Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)
Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).description:
如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{金刚重捶 Gorilla Pound}专长，处于@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{金刚式 Gorilla Stance}时你额外获得15尺攀爬速度。

你俯下身子，采取一个用指关节行动，令人难忘的架式。你进入金刚式，你唯一能进行的打击就是猩猩非武装攻击的挥击。这能造成1d8点钝击伤害；属于搏击武器组(brawling group)；拥有回摆、叠劲、擒抱、非致命与非武装特征。

当你进入金刚式时，你会获得15尺@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}速度。并且，当你进行攀爬的运动检定成功时，视为大成功。

Stance: Ironblood Stance.name: 架势: 铁血架势 Ironblood Stance
Stance: Ironblood Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9cYkB8DrUBBwqJd]{铁血架势 Ironblood Stance}。

你进入坚固如铁的架势中，不惧怕任何暴力攻击。你可以进行铁鞭无武装攻击。它造成1d8点钝击伤害，属于搏击武器组，拥有非致命、格挡、横扫和无武装特征。

当处于铁血架势中时，你对所有伤害获得抗力2。这个抗力在12级时提升为3，在16级时提升为4，在20级时提升为5。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fRlvmul3LbLo2xvR]{效果: 格挡}

Stance: Jellyfish Stance.name: 架势: Jellyfish Stance
Stance: Jellyfish Stance.description:
需求 You are unarmored.

You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity. You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in Jellyfish Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}.

Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.name: 架势: 禅弓式 Monastic Archer Stance
Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{禅弓式 Monastic Archer Stance}。

你摆出一个以弓为中心的特殊架式。进入禅弓式时，你唯一能进行的打击就是使用长弓、短弓或有武僧特征的弓的打击。

你可以在使用弓时进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{疾风连击 Flurry of Blows}。在用这些弓攻击，如果距离在第一射程增幅一半以内，那你就可以把一般需要非武装攻击的武僧专长或武僧能力用在弓的攻击上(一般来说，长弓是50尺，短弓是30尺)，只要该专长或能力没有要求要一次、具体的打击。

Stance: Mountain Stance.name: 架势: 山岳架势 Mountain Stance
Stance: Mountain Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{山岳架势 Mountain Stance}。

你进入山岳架势——最早由矮人武僧发现的技术——允许你借助山崩之力攻击敌人。你唯一能进行的打击是落石无武装攻击。它造成1d8点钝击伤害，属于搏击武器组，具有蓄力、非致命和无武装特征

处于山岳架势时，你的AC获得+4状态加值，对抗推撞或摔拌的防御会获得+2环境加值。但是，你AC上的敏捷上限会变成+0，意味着你无法将敏捷添加到AC上，并且你的所有速度降低5尺。山岳架势赋予的AC状态加值与@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dDIPA1WE9ESF67EB]{探险者服装 Clothing (Explorer's)}、@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{法师护甲 Mage Armor}和盔甲护腕上的潜能符文叠加。

Stance: Multishot Stance.name: 架势: 多重射击姿态 Multishot Stance
Stance: Multishot Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{多重射击姿态 Multishot Stance}.

当你处于此架势中时，你的@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PwcmmJOLY8C9JHau]{二重射击 Double Shot}减值降低到-1，若你要再用一个额外动作来普通攻击三次则为-2。若你从目前的位置移开，则此架势结束。

Stance: Paragon's Guard.name: 架势: 护卫典范 Paragon's Guard
Stance: Paragon's Guard.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hPDerDCYmag3s0dP]{护卫典范 Paragon's Guard}。

需求 你正持用一面盾牌。

当你有时间来定下你的架势时，你总是能不假思索地准备好你的盾牌。

当你在此架势下时，只要你满足动作的需求，你总是保持你的盾牌举起，如同已经使用过@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{举起盾牌 Raise a Shield}动作一般。

Stance: Peafowl Stance.name: 架势: 孔雀式 Peafowl Stance
Stance: Peafowl Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{孔雀式 Peafowl Stance}。

你摆出一个高姿态且自傲的架式，但仍保持灵活性，像孔雀一样镇静又优雅。

在此架式时，你唯一能进行的打击就是需求条件中的剑的近战打击。一轮一次，在你用这把剑进行攻击且击中后，你可以在下个动作以一个自由动作进行快步。

Stance: Point-Blank Shot.name: 架势: Point-Blank Shot
Stance: Point-Blank Shot.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point-Blank Shot}.

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.

Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.name: 架势: Rain of Embers Stance
Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.name: 架势: 散星式 Shooting Stars Stance
Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6cQSPqXoAO6oJl0i]{散星式 Shooting Stars Stance}。

你进入一个能让你以闪电般的速度投掷手里剑的架式。

在此架式时，你能够在使用手里剑时，应用那些一般需要非武装攻击的武僧专长或武僧能力。

Stance: Six Pillars Stance.name: 架势: Six Pillars Stance
Stance: Six Pillars Stance.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT0pVPqFuiEsmRb8]{Six Pillars Stance}

需求 You are unarmored.

You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed. While in this stance, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.

Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.name: 架势: Sky and Heaven Stance
Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}

You enter a stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven, allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.

While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.

Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.name: 架势: 燃焰架势 Stoked Flame Stance
Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.description:
需求 你未穿甲。

你进入一个迅速热烈的架势。你可以进行烁焰攻击，造成1d8挥砍伤害。它属于搏击武器组，具备蓄力、非致命、横扫和无武装特征。如果你发动了烁焰攻击的重击专精效果，你可以使用另一种效果：若你的重击造成伤害，目标额外受到1d6持续火焰伤害。

在燃焰架势下，你的速度额外获得5尺状态加值。如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Cq6NjvcKZOMySBVj]{高速移动 Incredible Movement}特性，其加值提升至15尺，且在3级之后的每4级提升5尺。

特殊 此专长获得神术或异能特征，以匹配你真气法术的根源，如果你有的话。

Stance: Stumbling Stance.name: 架势: 醉拳式 Stumbling Stance
Stance: Stumbling Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{醉拳式 Stumbling Stance}。

进入醉拳式时，你在使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}进行欺骗检定时获得+1环境加值。

你唯一能进行的打击就是晃身劝酒非武装攻击。这个非武装攻击造成1d8点钝击伤害；属于搏击武器组；有灵巧、背刺、娴熟、非致命和非武装特性。如果你处在这个架式时有敌人用近战打击击中你，那直到你下一回合结束之前，该敌人对你下一次的晃身劝酒@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.name: 架势: 盘根架势 Tangled Forest Stance
Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2tUdsoPEnW9yS8so]{盘根架势 Tangled Forest Stance}。

你伸长双臂，彷如扭曲的枝条一般阻碍敌人移动。你可以进行枝扫无武装攻击。它造成1d8点挥砍伤害，属于搏击武器组，拥有灵巧、娴熟、非致命、无武装特征。

当你处于盘根架势中并可以行动，每个在你触及内试图远离你的敌人必须成功一次反射豁免检定、特技技能检定或运动技能检定，对抗你的职业DC，失败则在那个动作中被@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}。若你愿意，可以允许敌人进行移动。

Stance: Tiger Stance.name: 架势: 猛虎架势 Tiger Stance
Stance: Tiger Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VCjAlOvjNvFJOsG5]{猛虎架势 Tiger Stance}。

你进入猛虎架势，能进行虎爪攻击。它造成1d8点挥砍伤害，属于搏击武器组，拥有灵巧、娴熟、非致命和无武装特征。

当你使用虎爪大成功时，若你造成伤害，目标会受到@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success]。

当你处于猛虎架势中至少拥有20尺的速度时，你的快步就能移动10尺。

Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.name: 架势: Vitality-Manipulation Stance
Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.description:
You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points like your rival Shino Hakusa. You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals [[/r {1d4}[negative]]]{1d4 negative damage}, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile positive traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes -10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.

Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.name: 架势: 游鸢式 Whirling Blade Stance
Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IaiEZaA8erufMUCr]{游鸢式 Whirling Blade Stance}。

你进入了一个沉静的架式，你与你的武僧武器间产生了紧密的联系，让你能以气御刀。

你持握且拥有娴熟特征的近战武僧武器获得投掷10尺的特征(除非这武器已经有了能投的更远的特征)。

当你用这种武器做了投掷打击后，你精准的投掷力道可以进行额外打击，就算武器与你有段距离。在判断新目标在不在打击范围内时，要以先前目标的空间当作开始计算武器的射程增量。在你的回合结束时，该投掷武器会笔直地朝你飞回来。如果路径上有坚固的屏障，那武器会在撞到屏障后落下。

Stance: Wild Winds Stance.name: 架势: Wild Winds Stance
Stance: Wild Winds Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{Wild Winds Stance}

You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance.

You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

Stance: Wolf Stance.name: 架势: 饿狼架势 Wolf Stance
Stance: Wolf Stance.description:
效果来自@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AN9jY1JVcU20Qdw6]{饿狼架势 Wolf Stance}。

你进入饿狼架势，降低重心身体贴至地面，双手犹如狼牙之形。你可以进行狼咬无武装攻击。它造成1d8点穿刺伤害，属于搏击武器组，拥有灵巧、背刺、娴熟、非致命、无武装特征。

若你处于饿狼架势时夹击一个目标，你的狼咬无武装攻击还能获得摔拌特征。

Effect: Rage.name: 效果: 狂暴 Rage
Effect: Rage.description:
需求 你未@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}或狂暴。

你唤起内心的怒意，开始狂暴。你获得等于你的等级+体质调整值的临时生命值。狂暴持续1分钟，或者直到没有你能发现的敌人存在，又或者直到你@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，以先发生的情况为准。你无法主动停止狂暴。在狂暴期间：

  • 你用近战武器或非武装攻击可造成额外2点伤害。若你的武器或无武装攻击有灵巧特征，此额外伤害减半。
  • 你的AC受到-1减值。
  • 你无法采取具有专注特征但不具有狂暴特征的行动。你可以在狂暴时进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}。

在你停止狂暴后，你失去狂暴赋予的所有临时生命值，并且在1分钟内无法再次狂暴。

赋予效果:

  • 根据等级及体质调整值赋予临时生命值
  • 应用狂暴伤害
  • 指示物特效
